attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Michael Shields is currently serving time in a British prison for something he didn't do.He was accused of attacking a man after the champions league final in Bulgaria,of which he was sleeping when the man was attacked.The real offender actually said himself that he committed the crime,and yet,Michael is still serving time! So free our Michael!

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Free Michael Shields."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12783.asp

Prime Minister's Office
